channel.title: Outbreak on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Outbreak on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Repeat creepy meat problems at Boar’s Head plants draw congressional scrutiny
item.description: Boar’s Head plans to reopen the plant linked to an outbreak that killed 10 people.

item.title: Boar’s Head to reopen plant as mold and funky meat problems pop up elsewhere
item.description: Inspection reports of other Boar’s Head plants do not bode well.

item.title: “It’s shocking”; Massive raw milk outbreak from 2023 finally reported
item.description: The outbreak occurred in 2023–2024, but little information had been shared about it.
